section.name: Overview
section.p:
In order to get your project up and running, please just follow the steps mentioned below.
Maven 2 Installation and Configuration
Firebird Installation and Configuration
Download Eclipse 3.2 Callisto
Set up your Maven2 Repository
If anything goes wrong please refer to the troubleshooting page. If not reported yet, please let us know.

section.name: Maven 2 Installation and Configuration
section.p:
Maven 2 can be downloaded from the Maven 2 Site
Unzip it into a specified directory, e.g. C:\PathToMaven2.

Refer to the readme.txt in the root directory of your Maven 2 Installation.
Please ensure that
JAVA_HOME is set and is pointing to the correct SDK (type java -version to test it)
The Maven Bin Directory is in your PATH variable

body.section:
Firebird can be downloaded from the Firebird Site
Please choose the installer method. This makes things easier for you. Just follow the onscreen instructions.
A nice admin tool for firbird databases can be downloaded from the SQL Manager Site
Just install it using the onscreen instructions.
First of all you have to set up your own Server. Therefore you have to register a new host.
A shortcut is also available by pressing SHIFT+CTRL+R.
Just change the following standard settings:
Protocol: TCP/IP
Password: masterkey
Click 'next' to continue. The other settings should just be left to the standard entries.
After you set up the server you have to set up the databases to get thing work. Doubleclick on the new host entry in the naigation area situated on your left.
openuss30.fdb - The Application Database
openuss30-test.fdb - The Test Database
Please choose 'Create a new database' from the menu. Unfortunatley there is no shortcut available for this one. The host name is your just generated server. It should allready be selected. Click 'Next'.
In the database path enter the full qualified path and file name of the database to be created, e.g. C:\DATABASES\openuss30.fdb.
Change the SQL Dialect from 1 to 3.
Leave all other settings to the standard ones and click 'Next'. A SQL excerpt will be presented to you. Just click 'Finish'.
Please repeat these steps for the test database naming it openuss30-test.fdb.
Go to the top.

section.name: Download Eclipse 3.2 Callisto
section.p: Just download the preconfigured eclipse version and unzip it to your harddisk.
After you unziped eclipse go to the Exadel Studio Site and download the free version Exadel Studio 4.0. After the download please follow the onscreen instructions to install it.

section.name: Set up your Maven2 Repository
section.p:
Go to your Maven 2 Root Directory. Edit the conf/settings.xml with a text editor of your choice. Go to the following entry, uncomment it and point it to a path on your harddisk, e.g. c:\Maven2\Repository.
<localRepository>C:/MyPathToMyRepository</localRepository>

In order to tell eclipse, where to find the additional libraries, you have to set up a eclipse system variable pointing to your local repository. In order to do so, go to the command shell and type
mvn -Declipse.workspace=<path-to-eclipse-workspace> eclipse:add-maven-repo
where the 'path-to-eclipse-workspace' is the path to your local workspace of eclipse. If you do not have one, you have to start eclipse before in order to create one. Maven then will create a class variable using the entry in the settings.xml. If the does not work you have to create the class variable by yourself.

In order to be able to use the ant build scripts you have to set up an eclipse ant property m2_repo pointing to your local repository. You can define such a property in the eclipse preferences (Ant/Runtimes/Properties).

body.section:
Please use your eclipse to download the sources via CVS form our sourceforge.net project site.
After download has finnished, open the java perspective and open the ant file openuss-plexus/tools/missing-dependencies/build.xml and execute the default target.
After build has finnished go to the main ant file openuss-plexus/build.xml and run the install target.
If you discover any problems blease refer to your troobleshooting page first.
Go to the top.
